About Me

Software Engineer | Music Nerd

Who Am I?

Niko here. I'm a Software Engineer at Plaid, specializing in infrastructure systems. My daily work involves architecting and maintaining scalable solutions leveraging technologies like Kubernetes and AWS. My background extends beyond platform engineering to include projects in embedded systems, AI with a focus on differential privacy, and other EECS fields, thanks to my BS and MEng from MIT.

Outside of work, you'll often find me exploring my creative side through music production, sharing my thoughts on my blogs (covering both tech and other topics), and maybe even giving my two cents on the latest movies as an unofficial film critic.
